content: i have added the pattern for this hat to my 7 hats more ebook 1 as a bonus pattern please note there was a mistake in the first version of the pattern it has been corrected and the pattern has been updated the * needs to be in front of the k1 at the beginning sorry for the confusion this is my go-to in a hurry need a hat right now pattern usually knit for my son who loses or gives away his warm hats with great regularity it can be knit with any super bulky weight yarn that knits to about 10 sts in 4 inches or a couple of chunky strands held together works great as well knit it plain or knit it striped it knits fast either way i can knit one of these in about 3 hours it is great for binge watching any of your favourite programs it is a perfect last minute gift or just right for charity knitting the crown shaping is a little bit different and gives the hat a nice finish especially when striped **materials ** drops andes beige/grey or drops snow pink/grey 100 m in one or two colours 8 0 mm us #11 circs and dpns markers and the regular notions 1 https //www ravelry com/patterns/sources/7-hats-more/patterns
